thread.section_title: Paramount Business Jets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paramount Business Jets | paramountbusinessjets.com
thread.title: Matt Howard
thread.title_full: Paramount Business Jets reviewed by Matt Howard

author: Matt Howard
title: Matt Howard
text: My wife and I had an EXCELLENT experience with Paramount Business Jets. Darin, our Charter Specialist, provided fast and professional service and took care of every single detail. He provided a wide variety of transportation options, handled booking, payment, catering, ground transportation and customs, and was in touch throughout the day to be sure everything was going smoothly. Our flight on a Challenger 300 was flawless. This was the first time we have chartered a private plane, and we definitely will do it again as a result of the wonderful experience we had with Paramount Business Jets.
